typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CardHolderData as ({@ExpTime} as long, {@FileSequence} as long, {@InstID} as long, {@RecordCount} as long, {@Version} as double, Contract as ({@RecordCount} as long, CardCount as long, CompanyID as long, CompanyName as string, ContractEndTime as long, ContractStartTime as long, Ptcpt as (Amount as boolean, Blocked as boolean, CardType as long, CardValEndTime as long, CardValStartTime as long, CarportID as boolean, Cust_Card_ID as string, FirstName as string, LastName as string, Paid as string, Participant_ID as long)[], SAP_Cust_ID as string, SpaceCount as long)[], ExportTime as long, Inst_ID as long, Manfac_ID as boolean)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	container: 'erp2',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> CardData
cleandate foldDown(unroll(CardHolderData.Contract, CardHolderData.Contract),
	mapColumn(
		{@RecordCount} = CardHolderData.Contract.{@RecordCount},
		CardCount = CardHolderData.Contract.CardCount,
		CompanyID = CardHolderData.Contract.CompanyID,
		CompanyName = CardHolderData.Contract.CompanyName,
		ContractEndTime = CardHolderData.Contract.ContractEndTime,
		ContractStartTime = CardHolderData.Contract.ContractStartTime,
		Ptcpt = CardHolderData.Contract.Ptcpt,
		SAP_Cust_ID = CardHolderData.Contract.SAP_Cust_ID,
		SpaceCount = CardHolderData.Contract.SpaceCount,
		Manfac_ID = CardHolderData.Manfac_ID,
		Manfac_ID_Long
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Contracts
cleanDates foldDown(unroll(Ptcpt, Ptcpt),
	mapColumn(
		Amount = Ptcpt.Amount,
		Blocked = Ptcpt.Blocked,
		CardType = Ptcpt.CardType,
		CardValEndTime = Ptcpt.CardValEndTime,
		CardValStartTime = Ptcpt.CardValStartTime,
		CarportID = Ptcpt.CarportID,
		Cust_Card_ID = Ptcpt.Cust_Card_ID,
		FirstName = Ptcpt.FirstName,
		LastName = Ptcpt.LastName,
		Paid = Ptcpt.Paid,
		Participant_ID = Ptcpt.Participant_ID,
		SAP_Cust_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Participants
CardData derive({CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString} = toTimestamp(toString(CardHolderData.ExportTime),"yyyyMMddHHmmss"),
		Manfac_ID_Long = toLong(case(CardHolderData.Manfac_ID, 1 , 0))) ~> cleandate
Contracts derive(ContractEndTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(ContractEndTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		ContractStartTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(ContractStartTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')) ~> cleanDates
Participants derive(CardValEndTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(CardValEndTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		CardValStartTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(CardValStartTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		Amount_Long = toLong(case(Amount,1,0)),
		Blocked_Long = toLong(case(Blocked,1,0)),
		Carport_ID_Long = toLong(case(CarportID,1,0)),
		Blocked_String = toString(case(Blocked,"Y","N"))) ~> cleanDatesForParticipants
cleanDatesForParticipants sink(input(
		Participant_ID as long,
		SAP_Cust_ID as string,
		Cust_Card_ID as long,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		CardValStartTime as timestamp,
		CardValEndTime as timestamp,
		Blocked as string,
		Paid as string,
		CardType as integer,
		Amount as integer,
		CarportID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Participant_ID,
		SAP_Cust_ID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		CardValStartTime = CardValStartTimeDate,
		CardValEndTime = CardValEndTimeDate,
		Paid,
		CardType,
		Amount = Amount_Long,
		Blocked = Blocked_String,
		CarportID = Carport_ID_Long
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
cleandate sink(input(
		Manfac_ID as long,
		Inst_ID as long,
		ExportTime as string,
		Version as string,
		RecordCount as long,
		ExpTime as string,
		FileSequence as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Manfac_ID = Manfac_ID_Long,
		Inst_ID = CardHolderData.{@InstID},
		ExportTime = {CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString},
		Version = CardHolderData.{@Version},
		RecordCount = CardHolderData.{@RecordCount},
		ExpTime = {CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString},
		FileSequence = CardHolderData.{@FileSequence}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
cleanDates sink(input(
		CompanyID as long,
		Manfac_ID as long,
		RecordCount as long,
		SAP_Cust_ID as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		ContractStartTime as string,
		ContractEndTime as string,
		CardCount as long,
		SpaceCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CompanyID,
		SAP_Cust_ID,
		CompanyName,
		CardCount,
		SpaceCount,
		ContractStartTime = ContractStartTimeDate,
		ContractEndTime = ContractEndTimeDate,
		Manfac_ID = Manfac_ID_Long,
		RecordCount = {@RecordCount}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3

source(output(
		CardHolderData as ({@ExpTime} as long, {@FileSequence} as short, {@InstID} as short, {@RecordCount} as short, {@Version} as double, Contract as ({@RecordCount} as short, CardCount as short, CompanyID as short, CompanyName as string, ContractEndTime as long, ContractStartTime as long, Ptcpt as (Amount as double, Blocked as string, CardType as short, CardValEndTime as long, CardValStartTime as long, CarportID as boolean, Cust_Card_ID as string, FirstName as string, LastName as string, Paid as string, Participant_ID as short)[], SAP_Cust_ID as string, SpaceCount as short)[], ExportTime as long, Inst_ID as short, Manfac_ID as long)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileNameImported',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*.CHD']) ~> CardData
cleandate foldDown(unroll(CardHolderData.Contract, CardHolderData.Contract),
	mapColumn(
		{@RecordCount} = CardHolderData.Contract.{@RecordCount},
		CardCount = CardHolderData.Contract.CardCount,
		CompanyID = CardHolderData.Contract.CompanyID,
		CompanyName = CardHolderData.Contract.CompanyName,
		ContractEndTime = CardHolderData.Contract.ContractEndTime,
		ContractStartTime = CardHolderData.Contract.ContractStartTime,
		Ptcpt = CardHolderData.Contract.Ptcpt,
		SAP_Cust_ID = CardHolderData.Contract.SAP_Cust_ID,
		SpaceCount = CardHolderData.Contract.SpaceCount,
		Manfac_ID = CardHolderData.Manfac_ID,
		Inst_ID = CardHolderData.Inst_ID,
		CardHolderId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Contracts
cleanDates foldDown(unroll(Ptcpt, Ptcpt),
	mapColumn(
		Amount = Ptcpt.Amount,
		Blocked = Ptcpt.Blocked,
		CardType = Ptcpt.CardType,
		CardValEndTime = Ptcpt.CardValEndTime,
		CardValStartTime = Ptcpt.CardValStartTime,
		CarportID = Ptcpt.CarportID,
		Cust_Card_ID = Ptcpt.Cust_Card_ID,
		FirstName = Ptcpt.FirstName,
		LastName = Ptcpt.LastName,
		Paid = Ptcpt.Paid,
		Participant_ID = Ptcpt.Participant_ID,
		SAP_Cust_ID,
		ContractId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Participants
CardData derive({CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString} = toTimestamp(toString(CardHolderData.ExportTime),"yyyyMMddHHmmss"),
		CardHolderId = nextSequence()) ~> cleandate
Contracts derive(ContractEndTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(ContractEndTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		ContractStartTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(ContractStartTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		ContractId = nextSequence()) ~> cleanDates
Participants derive(CardValEndTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(CardValEndTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		CardValStartTimeDate = toTimestamp(toString(CardValStartTime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		Carport_ID_Long = toLong(case(CarportID,1,0)),
		PartcId = nextSequence()) ~> cleanDatesForParticipants
cleanDatesForParticipants sink(input(
		PartIdPk as long,
		Participant_ID as long,
		ContractId as long,
		SAP_Cust_ID as string,
		Cust_Card_ID as long,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		CardValStartTime as timestamp,
		CardValEndTime as timestamp,
		Blocked as string,
		Paid as string,
		CardType as integer,
		Amount as decimal(18,0),
		CarportID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Participant_ID,
		SAP_Cust_ID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		CardValStartTime = CardValStartTimeDate,
		CardValEndTime = CardValEndTimeDate,
		Paid,
		CardType,
		Amount,
		Blocked,
		CarportID = Carport_ID_Long,
		PartIdPk = PartcId,
		ContractId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ParticipantsSing
cleandate sink(input(
		CardHolderDataId as long,
		Manfac_ID as long,
		Inst_ID as long,
		ExportTime as timestamp,
		Version as string,
		RecordCount as long,
		ExpTime as timestamp,
		FileSequence as long,
		FilenameImported as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Manfac_ID = CardHolderData.Manfac_ID,
		Inst_ID = CardHolderData.Inst_ID,
		ExportTime = {CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString},
		Version = CardHolderData.{@Version},
		RecordCount = CardHolderData.{@RecordCount},
		ExpTime = {CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString},
		FileSequence = CardHolderData.{@FileSequence},
		FilenameImported = FileNameImported,
		CardHolderDataId = CardHolderId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> CardDataSink
cleanDates sink(input(
		ContractId as long,
		CompanyID as long,
		CardHolderDataId as long,
		RecordCount as long,
		SAP_Cust_ID as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		ContractStartTime as timestamp,
		ContractEndTime as timestamp,
		CardCount as long,
		SpaceCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CompanyID,
		SAP_Cust_ID,
		CompanyName,
		CardCount,
		SpaceCount,
		ContractStartTime = ContractStartTimeDate,
		ContractEndTime = ContractEndTimeDate,
		ContractId,
		RecordCount = {@RecordCount},
		CardHolderDataId = CardHolderId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
cleandate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		CardHolderData,
		FileNameImported,
		ExportTimeDateString = {CardHolderData.ExportTimeDateString}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CardDataBlobJson
